page.title: 05Educational Technology
page.content: Radio,television and magnetic tape recording aids are used in schools to add interest to lessons. Films are shown and transparent photographs are shown on a screen by means of projectors _ which illustrate points which the teacher wishes to make. Very recently, the computer has been introduced to schools and children are being taught to operate these new electronic machines both for pleasure (playing games) and for learning. Our belief today is tha the silicon chip which stores information for recall, is going to revolutionise our lives by the uses to which it will be put.
